# RedCast

RedCast is a free online tool to download YouTube videos and audio.
Supported formats include MP4 (up to 8K/4320p) and MP3 (up to 320kbps).

## Key Pages

- [Home](https://www.redcast.online/)
- [YouTube to MP4](https://www.redcast.online/youtube-to-mp4)
- [YouTube to MP3](https://www.redcast.online/youtube-to-mp3)
- [Video Downloader](https://www.redcast.online/youtube-video-downloader-online)
- [1080p Downloader](https://www.redcast.online/download-youtube-1080p)

## Features

- Single video download
- Playlist download
- Bulk download
- Subtitle download
- No signup required
- Free to use
